body.name: VASAGLE LED Bed Frame Queen Size with 4 Drawers and Charging Station, Queen Bed Frame with 1 USB Port and 1 Type C Port, Steel Slats, No Box Spring Needed, Dark Gray URMB831G71
features: [Storage Aplenty] 4 large storage drawers with mats to tuck away extra bedding and off-season clothes. 2 handy side pockets to hold your phone, tablet, or nighttime reads for easy access. This bed frame keeps your bedroom tidy and everything in its place

[Color and Mode-Adjustable LED Lights] The LED lights built into the queen bed frame boast 25 colors, 6 brightness levels, 3 flashing modes, and 6 flashing rates. You can use the remote control to adjust the color and mode to create different atmospheres

[Convenient Charging Station] This bed frame with 1 USB port and 1 type C port on one side (which side is up to you during assembly) allows you to charge 2 devices at once, making binging on a show or playing video games in bed free from charging issues

[Stable and Sturdy] Supported by sturdy steel slats, this robust queen-size bed frame with drawers supports up to 1000 lb and is more stable and durable than bed frames supported by wooden slats, letting you rest easy

[Easy Assembly & Predrilled Headboard Holes] Numbered parts and clear instructions make this bed frame a breeze to assemble; this bed frame comes with predrilled holes in the legs to allow you to easily attach your own headboard

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Predrilled Holes This bed frame has predrilled holes in the legs so you can easily attach your own headboard to the frame. Drawer Fixtures Each drawer comes with a small screw to fix it to the bed frame so the drawer won't roll around under the bed. High Weight Capacity Crafted with quality steel, this bed frame is strong enough to hold up to 1000 Ib, giving you peace of mind while you rest.

Static Load Capacity: 1000 lb (454 kg) Package Contents: 1 x Queen Bed Frame4 x Storage Drawer1 x Assembly Kit1 x Instructions VASAGLE Notes: Do not allow children to put their heads into the gaps between the metal frame.Mattress is not included.Be sure to use adapters with a power of no less than 5V/2A to make the charging ports work properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed frame
reviews.reviewText: The VASAGLE LED Bed Frame Queen Size is a remarkable addition to any bedroom, offering a seamless blend of modern design and practicality. This bed frame stands out with its thoughtful features, catering to both aesthetics and functionality.Crafted with a focus on convenience, the inclusion of four spacious drawers provides ample storage for bedding, clothing, or other personal items, ensuring a clutter-free space and maximizing the utilization of bedroom space.The built-in LED headboard not only adds a contemporary touch to the room but also serves as a functional lighting element for bedtime reading or creating a soothing atmosphere, allowing for versatile use.A standout feature of this bed frame is the integrated charging station equipped with 1 USB port and 1 Type C port. This thoughtful addition allows for easy and convenient charging of electronic devices, eliminating the hassle of searching for outlets or adapters near the bed.Constructed with sturdy steel slats, this bed frame ensures reliable support for the mattress without the need for a box spring, providing stability and durability for a comfortable night’s sleep.The dark gray finish of the frame complements various bedroom decor styles, adding a touch of sophistication and versatility to the room. Obviously the VASAGLE LED Bed Frame Queen Size with its LED headboard, ample storage, integrated charging ports, sturdy construction, and modern design, offers a practical yet stylish solution for those seeking a functional and visually appealing centerpiece for their bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pieces were labeled clearly and packaged well. The directions were easy to understand. 1 adult and 1 teen (both females) were able to get this thing out together easily and in about an hour. My daughter loved the LED feature for the footboard. Great option for a fast furniture/college apartment piece. I say it was worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product assembled easily and was very sturdy. However, the wall adapter that is necessary to power the USB and lights, is not included, and according to Customer Support, it’s not even a so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Bang for the Buck!
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this purchase. Well engineered, everything fit together nicely, no missing parts, clear instructions. The only downside is, there are many screws, so it took me a couple of hours to assemble using the included allen wrenches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Lights are junk
reviews.reviewText: The lights in the front look nice. Its a tube not a cheap glue strip. But they dont stay on very long before they turn off. Whats the point of LED LIGHTS if they wont stay on.Do not recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The drawers do not attach
reviews.reviewText: perfect bed Fram its just a bummer that the drawers don't attach to the Fram itself so they kind of slide around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good item
reviews.reviewText: The lights won't stay on. They turn off after 10 minutes no matter what. So what's the point
